meanings.definition: Informal term for pajamas or sleepwear.
meanings.sent1: Every night, I put on my cozy jammies before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: She loves to wear her favorite jammies on lazy Sundays.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally wore my jammies to the grocery store and didn't realize until I got there!
meanings.sent4: Her jammies were like a warm hug, comforting her after a long day.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of my jammies made me feel like I was wrapped in a cloud.

meanings.definition: A pair of loose-fitting pants worn for sleeping or lounging.
meanings.sent1: During summer, I prefer wearing lightweight jammies to stay cool at night.
meanings.sent2: He bought a new pair of jammies with cute patterns for his vacation.
meanings.sent3: She tried doing yoga in her jammies, but they kept slipping down!
meanings.sent4: His jammies were so comfortable, it felt like wearing a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The elastic waistband of my jammies was like a gentle hug around my waist.
